posts.post_content:
FS:  1926-29 Exhibits JIMMIE FOXX (Rookie) - ungraded

$1,450  -  Payment via PP F&F

* Love of the Game Auctions just sold a PSA 2 for $5,100.00 on 3 April 2022 *

Jimmie "The Beast" Foxx was the second man to hit 500 home runs (first to do it right-handed).  Foxx was a 3x MVP (first player to do that), 2x Batting Champion, and a Triple Crown winner (1933).  He could hit for power and average - belting 534 home runs, with a .325 lifetime batting average.  Side-by-side, his credentials stack up to Lou Gehrig.

The corners of the post card were apparently lost to a photo album - still, great eye-appeal.
* On 3 Apr 2022, Love of the Game Auctions sold a PSA 2 for $5,100.00 * - this card won't grade PSA 2, but it is only a fraction of that price
The 1926-29 Exhibits Jimmie Foxx (Rookie) is picking up steam - get it while you still can...
